metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15369 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The build_filter_chain function in pdf/pdf-stream.c in Artifex MuPDF before2017-09-25 mishandles a certain case where a variable may reside in aregister, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Fitzfz_drop_imp use-after-free and application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted PDF document.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
